name: Faster Future
description: Vice Admiral Janeway wants to use Discovery's spore drive to rescue her crew on the Voyager, violating a Federation ban. But, Mirror LaForge has his own plans for the illegal technology. Have your crew determine who has the best claim!
rules:
-- Unique Federation, Borg, and Terran Empire Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Janeway, Zora, or G. La Forge will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Janeway, Zora, or G. La Forge
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Terran Empire faction missions.

screens.text: "Please, I'd appreciate any assistance you may offer. This is difficult to explain, but... well, someone is attempting to steal something from me. I cannot allow her to have it. My records show her name is Vice Admiral Janeway."

"Who is that speaking? When I heard about the mysterious spore drive, I realized Voyager could use it to jump home moments after arriving in the Delta Quadrant. However, that woman is blocking my entry to Discovery to retrieve the drive. I must be allowed to save my crew."

"The Borg have been at my throat for so long, I was shocked when they offered assistance with boarding Discovery. Using the spore drive for Voyager means their transwarp hub never gets destroyed. If that's the tradeoff for getting my crew home... so be it."

"When the Stamets from my universe died, we'd thought the spore drive technology was lost. I guess I should thank you, Vice Admiral, for revealing on open channels that another one still exists. The Terran Empire won't be able to ignore me any longer when I recover that drive."
